text: Dan Trant (May 15, 1961 – September 11, 2001) was a basketball player and Cantor Fitzgerald bond trader killed in the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States. Trant was drafted in the 10th round and was the 228th and last pick in the 1984 NBA draft. He was part of the 1984–85 Boston Celtics season. Trant attended Clark University. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Victims of the September 11 attacks Category:American terrorism victims Category:Clark University alumni Category:Boston Celtics draft picks Category:Male murder victims Category:Murdered American basketball players Category:People murdered in New York (state) Category:Terrorism deaths in New York (state)
title: Dan Trant
